name: TS **
quote: I think this was the best pizza Iâ€™ve ever had, and itâ€™s GLUTEN FREE! It was so delicious that after finishing my dinner, I immediately ordered another one to take away. The crust, the flavors, everything was perfect. The crustâ€¦ so delicious... How is it possible thatâ€™s gluten free?! The owner has celiacs, so it is for sure GF. The people who own the restaurant are very sweet and welcoming, it really added to the whole experience. Out of everything in Seoul, this pizza is what Iâ€™ll miss the most. If youâ€™re anywhere nearby, do yourself a favor and go. You wonâ€™t regret it.

name: Ãgoston Haj***
quote: The best gluten free pizza I ever had! The prices are a bit high but it's well worth it. The owner is nice and the head waiter is super lovely and accommodating. The place has a cool vibe with iconic Hollywood movie star visuals on the tables and walls. This is a great place to chill and eat well as part of hanging out in Itaewon.
